query: 如图,在△ABC中,∠ACB=45°,AD⊥BC于点D,点E为AD上一点,连接CE,CE=AB,若∠ACE=20°,则∠B的度数为()选项：['60°', '65°', '70°', '75°']
answer: 解:∵AD⊥BC,∠ACB=45,∴△ADC是等腰直角三角形,∴AD=CD,∠CAE=∠ACD=45°,在Rt△ABD与Rt△CED中≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{AD=CD}\\{AB=CE}\end{array}\right.,∴Rt△ABD≌Rt△CED(HL),∴∠B=∠DEC,∵∠DEC=∠CAE+∠ACE=45°+20°=65°,∴∠B=65°故选:B.
